analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: Neutral regime persists amid commodity-led rotation. The GMS equilibrium at 50 necessitates a tactical pause as the fiscal-monetary nexus oscillates under Fed divergence. While credit spread compression remains static, the pronounced crypto-equity divergence and aggressive commodity appreciation signal a rotation toward hard assets rather than broad-based beta expansion. Liquidity convexity is diminishing as the DXY strengthens, suggesting that the current equity ascent lacks secular momentum. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.EN: Neutral regime persists amid commodity-led rotation. The GMS equilibrium at 50 necessitates a tactical pause as the fiscal-monetary nexus oscillates under Fed divergence. While credit spread compression remains static, the pronounced crypto-equity divergence and aggressive commodity appreciation signal a rotation toward hard assets rather than broad-based beta expansion. Liquidity convexity is diminishing as the DXY strengthens, suggesting that the current equity ascent lacks secular momentum. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
reports.ES: Equilibrio neutral ante rotaciÃ³n hacia commodities. El GMS en 50 dicta una pausa tÃ¡ctica mientras el nexo fiscal-monetario se fractura por la divergencia de la Fed. La compresiÃ³n de diferenciales de crÃ©dito se estabiliza, pero la divergencia entre criptoactivos y renta variable, sumada al auge de activos reales, seÃ±ala una degradaciÃ³n del rÃ©gimen de liquidez. El fortalecimiento del DXY limita la expansiÃ³n de mÃºltiplos, sugiriendo que la apreciaciÃ³n actual carece de impulso secular. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.ID: Rezim netral di tengah rotasi komoditas. GMS 50 menunjukkan titik ekuilibrium yang memerlukan jeda taktis akibat divergensi kebijakan Fed. Meskipun kompresi spread kredit stabil, divergensi tajam antara kripto dan ekuitas serta lonjakan aset keras menandakan penipisan konveksitas likuiditas. Penguatan DXY menekan apresiasi aset berisiko, mengindikasikan bahwa kenaikan pasar saat ini kurang memiliki momentum sekuler. Risiko stagflasi meningkat seiring lonjakan harga energi dan logam industri. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.DE: Neutrales Regime bei Rohstoff-Rotation. Der GMS-Wert von 50 erzwingt taktische ZurÃ¼ckhaltung, da der fiskalisch-monetÃ¤re Nexus unter der Fed-Divergenz oszilliert. WÃ¤hrend die Credit-Spread-Kompression stagniert, signalisiert die Divergenz zwischen Krypto und Equity eine Erosion der LiquiditÃ¤tskonvexitÃ¤t. Ein erstarkender DXY dÃ¤mpft das Beta-Potenzial, was darauf hindeutet, dass dem aktuellen Aufschwung die sÃ¤kulare Dynamik fehlt. Die Rallye bei Industriemetallen erhÃ¶ht die Tail-Risiken einer Stagflation. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

La compression des spreads de crÃ©dit stagne, tandis que la divergence entre crypto-actifs et actions, corrÃ©lÃ©e Ã  l'apprÃ©ciation des actifs rÃ©els, signale une dÃ©gradation de la convexitÃ© de la liquiditÃ©.
